attributes.action: Stop the Closure of the Castle Armoury (Drill Hall in Bury Lancashire
attributes.background:
Very sad news. The historic link between the town of Bury & the Fusiliers is now under threat. 
We want the government to step n and save it for the community, its part of Burys Heritage

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the local drill halls are an operational matter for those responsible for individual detachments, not the UK Government or Parliament.
